borderTransparent.description: Used for weak colored borders like larger alert/banner boxes and smaller badges and tags

contrastText.description: Text color for text ontop of main

name.description: color intent (primary, secondary, info, error, etc)

elevated.description:
For popovers and menu backgrounds. This is the same color as primary in most light themes but in dark
themes it has a brighter shade to help give it contrast against the primary background.

secondary.description: Cards and elements that need to stand out on the primary background

maxContrast.description: Used for auto white or dark text on colored backgrounds

disabledBackground.description: Used for disabled buttons and inputs

focus.description: Used focused menu item / select option

hover.description: Used for hovered menu item / select option

hoverOpacity.description: Used for button/colored background hover opacity

selected.description: Used for selected menu item / select option

FeatureToggles.description:
Describes available feature toggles in Grafana. These can be configured via
conf/custom.ini to enable features under development or not yet available in
stable version.

Only enabled values will be returned in this interface.

NOTE: the possible values may change between versions without notice, although
this may cause compilation issues when depending on removed feature keys, the
runtime state will continue to work.

addFieldFromCalculationStatFunctions.description: Add cumulative and window functions to the add field from calculation transformation

adhocFiltersInTooltips.description: Enable adhoc filter buttons in visualization tooltips

aiGeneratedDashboardChanges.description: Enable AI powered features for dashboards to auto-summary changes when saving

alertEnrichment.description: Enable configuration of alert enrichments in Grafana Cloud.

alertRuleRestore.description: Enables the alert rule restore feature

alertRuleUseFiredAtForStartsAt.description: Use FiredAt for StartsAt when sending alerts to Alertmaanger

alertingAIFeedback.description: Enable AI-generated feedback from the Grafana UI.

alertingAIImproveAlertRules.description: Enable AI-improve alert rules labels and annotations.

alertingBulkActionsInUI.description: Enables the alerting bulk actions in the UI

alertingCentralAlertHistory.description: Enables the new central alert history.

alertingDisableSendAlertsExternal.description: Disables the ability to send alerts to an external Alertmanager datasource.

alertingEnrichmentPerRule.description: Enable enrichment per rule in the alerting UI.

alertingFilterV2.description: Enable the new alerting search experience

alertingImportAlertmanagerAPI.description: Enables the API to import Alertmanager configuration

alertingImportAlertmanagerUI.description: Enables the UI to see imported Alertmanager configuration

alertingImportYAMLUI.description: Enables a UI feature for importing rules from a Prometheus file to Grafana-managed rules

alertingJiraIntegration.description: Enables the new Jira integration for contact points in cloud alert managers.

alertingListViewV2.description: Enables the new alert list view design

alertingListViewV2PreviewToggle.description: Enables the alerting list view v2 preview toggle

alertingMigrationUI.description: Enables the alerting migration UI, to migrate data source-managed rules to Grafana-managed rules

alertingNotificationsStepMode.description: Enables simplified step mode in the notifications section

alertingPrometheusRulesPrimary.description: Uses Prometheus rules as the primary source of truth for ruler-enabled data sources

alertingProvenanceLockWrites.description: Enables a feature to avoid issues with concurrent writes to the alerting provenance table in MySQL

alertingQueryAndExpressionsStepMode.description: Enables step mode for alerting queries and expressions

alertingQueryOptimization.description: Optimizes eligible queries in order to reduce load on datasources

alertingRulePermanentlyDelete.description: Enables UI functionality to permanently delete alert rules

alertingRuleRecoverDeleted.description: Enables the UI functionality to recover and view deleted alert rules

alertingRuleVersionHistoryRestore.description: Enables the alert rule version history restore feature

alertingSaveStateCompressed.description: Enables the compressed protobuf-based alert state storage. Default is enabled.

alertingSaveStatePeriodic.description: Writes the state periodically to the database, asynchronous to rule evaluation

alertingUIOptimizeReducer.description: Enables removing the reducer from the alerting UI when creating a new alert rule and using instant query

alertmanagerRemotePrimary.description: Enable Grafana to have a remote Alertmanager instance as the primary Alertmanager.

alertmanagerRemoteSecondary.description: Enable Grafana to sync configuration and state with a remote Alertmanager.

alertmanagerRemoteSecondaryWithRemoteSta.description: Starts Grafana in remote secondary mode pulling the latest state from the remote Alertmanager to avoid duplicate notifications.

annotationPermissionUpdate.description: Change the way annotation permissions work by scoping them to folders and dashboards.

appPlatformGrpcClientAuth.description: Enables the gRPC client to authenticate with the App Platform by using ID & access tokens

assetSriChecks.description: Enables SRI checks for Grafana JavaScript assets

authZGRPCServer.description: Enables the gRPC server for authorization

awsAsyncQueryCaching.description: Enable caching for async queries for Redshift and Athena. Requires that the datasource has caching and async query support enabled

awsDatasourcesTempCredentials.description: Support temporary security credentials in AWS plugins for Grafana Cloud customers

azureMonitorDisableLogLimit.description: Disables the log limit restriction for Azure Monitor when true. The limit is enabled by default.

azureMonitorEnableUserAuth.description: Enables user auth for Azure Monitor datasource only

azureMonitorLogsBuilderEditor.description: Enables the logs builder mode for the Azure Monitor data source

azureMonitorPrometheusExemplars.description: Allows configuration of Azure Monitor as a data source that can provide Prometheus exemplars

azureResourcePickerUpdates.description: Enables the updated Azure Monitor resource picker

cachingOptimizeSerializationMemoryUsage.description: If enabled, the caching backend gradually serializes query responses for the cache, comparing against the configured `[caching]max_value_mb` value as it goes. This can can help prevent Grafana from running out of memory while attempting to cache very large query responses.

canvasPanelPanZoom.description: Allow pan and zoom in canvas panel

cdnPluginsLoadFirst.description: Prioritize loading plugins from the CDN before other sources

cdnPluginsUrls.description: Enable loading plugins via declarative URLs

cloudRBACRoles.description: Enabled grafana cloud specific RBAC roles

cloudWatchBatchQueries.description: Runs CloudWatch metrics queries as separate batches

cloudWatchCrossAccountQuerying.description: Enables cross-account querying in CloudWatch datasources

cloudWatchNewLabelParsing.description: Updates CloudWatch label parsing to be more accurate

cloudWatchRoundUpEndTime.description: Round up end time for metric queries to the next minute to avoid missing data

configurableSchedulerTick.description: Enable changing the scheduler base interval via configuration option unified_alerting.scheduler_tick_interval

crashDetection.description: Enables browser crash detection reporting to Faro.

dashboardLevelTimeMacros.description: Supports __from and __to macros that always use the dashboard level time range

dashboardLibrary.description: Enable dashboard library experiments that are production ready

dashboardScene.description: Enables dashboard rendering using scenes for all roles

dashboardSceneForViewers.description: Enables dashboard rendering using Scenes for viewer roles

dashboardSceneSolo.description: Enables rendering dashboards using scenes for solo panels

dashboardSchemaValidationLogging.description: Log schema validation errors so they can be analyzed later

dashgpt.description: Enable AI powered features in dashboards

dataplaneFrontendFallback.description: Support dataplane contract field name change for transformations and field name matchers where the name is different

datasourceConnectionsTab.description: Shows defined connections for a data source in the plugins detail page

datasourceQueryTypes.description: Show query type endpoints in datasource API servers (currently hardcoded for testdata, expressions, and prometheus)

disableClassicHTTPHistogram.description: Disables classic HTTP Histogram (use with enableNativeHTTPHistogram)

disableNumericMetricsSortingInExpression.description: In server-side expressions, disable the sorting of numeric-kind metrics by their metric name or labels.

disableSSEDataplane.description: Disables dataplane specific processing in server side expressions.

editPanelCSVDragAndDrop.description: Enables drag and drop for CSV and Excel files

elasticsearchCrossClusterSearch.description: Enables cross cluster search in the Elasticsearch data source

elasticsearchImprovedParsing.description: Enables less memory intensive Elasticsearch result parsing

enableAppChromeExtensions.description: Set this to true to enable all app chrome extensions registered by plugins.

enableDashboardEmptyExtensions.description: Set this to true to enable all dashboard empty state extensions registered by plugins.

enableDatagridEditing.description: Enables the edit functionality in the datagrid panel

enableExtensionsAdminPage.description: Enables the extension admin page regardless of development mode

enableSCIM.description: Enables SCIM support for user and group management

enableScopesInMetricsExplore.description: Enables the scopes usage in Metrics Explore

exploreLogsAggregatedMetrics.description: Used in Logs Drilldown to query by aggregated metrics

exploreLogsLimitedTimeRange.description: Used in Logs Drilldown to limit the time range

exploreLogsShardSplitting.description: Used in Logs Drilldown to split queries into multiple queries based on the number of shards

exploreMetricsRelatedLogs.description: Display Related Logs in Grafana Metrics Drilldown

externalServiceAccounts.description: Automatic service account and token setup for plugins

extractFieldsNameDeduplication.description: Make sure extracted field names are unique in the dataframe

faroDatasourceSelector.description: Enable the data source selector within the Frontend Apps section of the Frontend Observability

feedbackButton.description: Enables a button to send feedback from the Grafana UI

fetchRulesUsingPost.description: Use a POST request to list rules by passing down the namespaces user has access to

foldersAppPlatformAPI.description: Enables use of app platform API for folders

grafanaAPIServerEnsureKubectlAccess.description: Start an additional https handler and write kubectl options

grafanaAPIServerWithExperimentalAPIs.description: Register experimental APIs with the k8s API server, including all datasources

grafanaAssistantInProfilesDrilldown.description: Enables integration with Grafana Assistant in Profiles Drilldown

grafanaconThemes.description: Enables the temporary themes for GrafanaCon

graphiteBackendMode.description: Enables the Graphite data source full backend mode

groupAttributeSync.description: Enable the groupsync extension for managing Group Attribute Sync feature

groupByVariable.description: Enable groupBy variable support in scenes dashboards

groupToNestedTableTransformation.description: Enables the group to nested table transformation

improvedExternalSessionHandling.description: Enables improved support for OAuth external sessions. After enabling this feature, users might need to re-authenticate themselves.

improvedExternalSessionHandlingSAML.description: Enables improved support for SAML external sessions. Ensure the NameID format is correctly configured in Grafana for SAML Single Logout to function properly.

individualCookiePreferences.description: Support overriding cookie preferences per user

infinityRunQueriesInParallel.description: Enables running Infinity queries in parallel

influxdbBackendMigration.description: Query InfluxDB InfluxQL without the proxy

influxdbRunQueriesInParallel.description: Enables running InfluxDB Influxql queries in parallel

influxqlStreamingParser.description: Enable streaming JSON parser for InfluxDB datasource InfluxQL query language

inviteUserExperimental.description: Renders invite user button along the app

jaegerEnableGrpcEndpoint.description: Enable querying trace data through Jaeger's gRPC endpoint (HTTP)

jitterAlertRulesWithinGroups.description: Distributes alert rule evaluations more evenly over time, including spreading out rules within the same group. Disables sequential evaluation if enabled.

kubernetesAggregatorCapTokenAuth.description: Enable CAP token based authentication in grafana's embedded kube-aggregator

kubernetesAlertingRules.description: Adds support for Kubernetes alerting and recording rules

kubernetesAnnotations.description: Enables app platform API for annotations

kubernetesAuthZHandlerRedirect.description: Redirects the traffic from the legacy access control endpoints to the new K8s AuthZ endpoints

kubernetesAuthnMutation.description: Enables create, delete, and update mutations for resources owned by IAM identity

kubernetesAuthzZanzanaSync.description: Enable sync of Zanzana authorization store on AuthZ CRD mutations

kubernetesDashboards.description: Use the kubernetes API in the frontend for dashboards

kubernetesFeatureToggles.description: Use the kubernetes API for feature toggle management in the frontend

kubernetesLibraryPanels.description: Routes library panel requests from /api to the /apis endpoint

kubernetesLogsDrilldown.description: Adds support for Kubernetes logs drilldown

kubernetesShortURLs.description: Enables k8s short url api and uses it under the hood when handling legacy /api

kubernetesSnapshots.description: Routes snapshot requests from /api to the /apis endpoint

kubernetesStars.description: Routes stars requests from /api to the /apis endpoint

localeFormatPreference.description: Specifies the locale so the correct format for numbers and dates can be shown

logQLScope.description: In-development feature that will allow injection of labels into loki queries.

logRequestsInstrumentedAsUnknown.description: Logs the path for requests that are instrumented as unknown

logRowsPopoverMenu.description: Enable filtering menu displayed when text of a log line is selected

logsContextDatasourceUi.description: Allow datasource to provide custom UI for context view

logsExploreTableDefaultVisualization.description: Sets the logs table as default visualisation in logs explore

logsExploreTableVisualisation.description: A table visualisation for logs in Explore

logsInfiniteScrolling.description: Enables infinite scrolling for the Logs panel in Explore and Dashboards

logsPanelControls.description: Enables a control component for the logs panel in Explore

lokiExperimentalStreaming.description: Support new streaming approach for loki (prototype, needs special loki build)

lokiLabelNamesQueryApi.description: Defaults to using the Loki `/labels` API instead of `/series`

lokiLogsDataplane.description: Changes logs responses from Loki to be compliant with the dataplane specification.

lokiQuerySplitting.description: Split large interval queries into subqueries with smaller time intervals

lokiRunQueriesInParallel.description: Enables running Loki queries in parallel

lokiShardSplitting.description: Use stream shards to split queries into smaller subqueries

managedDualWriter.description: Pick the dual write mode from database configs

metricsFromProfiles.description: Enables creating metrics from profiles and storing them as recording rules

mlExpressions.description: Enable support for Machine Learning in server-side expressions

mysqlAnsiQuotes.description: Use double quotes to escape keyword in a MySQL query

newClickhouseConfigPageDesign.description: Enables new design for the Clickhouse data source configuration page

newDashboardWithFiltersAndGroupBy.description: Enables filters and group by variables on all new dashboards. Variables are added only if default data source supports filtering.

newFiltersUI.description: Enables new combobox style UI for the Ad hoc filters variable in scenes architecture

newInfluxDSConfigPageDesign.description: Enables new design for the InfluxDB data source configuration page

newPDFRendering.description: New implementation for the dashboard-to-PDF rendering

newShareReportDrawer.description: Enables the report creation drawer in a dashboard

oauthRequireSubClaim.description: Require that sub claims is present in oauth tokens.

onPremToCloudMigrations.description: Enable the Grafana Migration Assistant, which helps you easily migrate various on-prem resources to your Grafana Cloud stack.

onlyStoreActionSets.description: When storing dashboard and folder resource permissions, only store action sets and not the full list of underlying permission

otelLogsFormatting.description: Applies OTel formatting templates to displayed logs

panelFilterVariable.description: Enables use of the `systemPanelFilterVar` variable to filter panels in a dashboard

panelTimeSettings.description: Enables a new panel time settings drawer

panelTitleSearch.description: Search for dashboards using panel title

passwordlessMagicLinkAuthentication.description: Enable passwordless login via magic link authentication

pdfTables.description: Enables generating table data as PDF in reporting

permissionsFilterRemoveSubquery.description: Alternative permission filter implementation that does not use subqueries for fetching the dashboard folder

pluginInstallAPISync.description: Enable syncing plugin installations to the installs API

pluginStoreServiceLoading.description: Load plugins on store service startup instead of wire provider, and call RegisterFixedRoles after all plugins are loaded

pluginsAutoUpdate.description: Enables auto-updating of users installed plugins

pluginsSkipHostEnvVars.description: Disables passing host environment variable to plugin processes

pluginsSriChecks.description: Enables SRI checks for plugin assets

postgresDSUsePGX.description: Enables using PGX instead of libpq for PostgreSQL datasource

preferLibraryPanelTitle.description: Prefer library panel title over viz panel title.

preserveDashboardStateWhenNavigating.description: Enables possibility to preserve dashboard variables and time range when navigating between dashboards

preventPanelChromeOverflow.description: Restrict PanelChrome contents with overflow: hidden;

prometheusAzureOverrideAudience.description: Deprecated. Allow override default AAD audience for Azure Prometheus endpoint. Enabled by default. This feature should no longer be used and will be removed in the future.

prometheusSpecialCharsInLabelValues.description: Adds support for quotes and special characters in label values for Prometheus queries

prometheusTypeMigration.description: Checks for deprecated Prometheus authentication methods (SigV4 and Azure), installs the relevant data source, and migrates the Prometheus data sources

publicDashboardsEmailSharing.description: Enables public dashboard sharing to be restricted to only allowed emails

publicDashboardsScene.description: Enables public dashboard rendering using scenes

queryCacheRequestDeduplication.description: Enable request deduplication when query caching is enabled. Requests issuing the same query will be deduplicated, only the first request to arrive will be executed and the response will be shared with requests arriving while there is a request in-flight

queryServiceFromExplore.description: Routes explore requests to the new query service

queryServiceFromUI.description: Routes requests to the new query service

queryServiceRewrite.description: Rewrite requests targeting /ds/query to the query service

queryServiceWithConnections.description: Adds datasource connections to the query service

refactorVariablesTimeRange.description: Refactor time range variables flow to reduce number of API calls made when query variables are chained

reloadDashboardsOnParamsChange.description: Enables reload of dashboards on scopes, time range and variables changes

renderAuthJWT.description: Uses JWT-based auth for rendering instead of relying on remote cache

rendererDisableAppPluginsPreload.description: Disable pre-loading app plugins when the request is coming from the renderer

reportingRetries.description: Enables rendering retries for the reporting feature

restrictedPluginApis.description: Enables sharing a list of APIs with a list of plugins

rolePickerDrawer.description: Enables the new role picker drawer design

scanRowInvalidDashboardParseFallbackEnab.description: Enable fallback parsing behavior when scan row encounters invalid dashboard JSON

scopeApi.description: In-development feature flag for the scope api using the app platform.

scopeFilters.description: Enables the use of scope filters in Grafana

scopeSearchAllLevels.description: Enable scope search to include all levels of the scope node tree

secretsManagementAppPlatform.description: Enable the secrets management API and services under app platform

secretsManagementAppPlatformUI.description: Enable the secrets management app platform UI

sharingDashboardImage.description: Enables image sharing functionality for dashboards

showDashboardValidationWarnings.description: Show warnings when dashboards do not validate against the schema

sqlExpressions.description: Enables SQL Expressions, which can execute SQL queries against data source results.

sqlExpressionsColumnAutoComplete.description: Enables column autocomplete for SQL Expressions

sseGroupByDatasource.description: Send query to the same datasource in a single request when using server side expressions. The `cloudWatchBatchQueries` feature toggle should be enabled if this used with CloudWatch.

ssoSettingsLDAP.description: Use the new SSO Settings API to configure LDAP

storage.description: Configurable storage for dashboards, datasources, and resources

suggestedDashboards.description: Enable suggested dashboards when creating new dashboards

tableSharedCrosshair.description: Enables shared crosshair in table panel

tabularNumbers.description: Use fixed-width numbers globally in the UI

teamHttpHeadersTempo.description: Enables LBAC for datasources for Tempo to apply LBAC filtering of traces to the client requests for users in teams

templateVariablesUsesCombobox.description: Use new **Combobox** component for template variables

tempoAlerting.description: Enables creating alerts from Tempo data source

tempoSearchBackendMigration.description: Run search queries through the tempo backend

timeComparison.description: Enables time comparison option in supported panels

tlsMemcached.description: Use TLS-enabled memcached in the enterprise caching feature

unifiedHistory.description: Displays the navigation history so the user can navigate back to previous pages

unifiedRequestLog.description: Writes error logs to the request logger

unifiedStorageBigObjectsSupport.description: Enables to save big objects in blob storage

unifiedStorageGrpcConnectionPool.description: Enables the unified storage grpc connection pool

unifiedStorageHistoryPruner.description: Enables the unified storage history pruner

unifiedStorageSearchDualReaderEnabled.description: Enable dual reader for unified storage search

unifiedStorageSearchSprinkles.description: Enable sprinkles on unified storage search

useKubernetesShortURLsAPI.description: Routes short url requests from /api to the /apis endpoint in the frontend. Depends on kubernetesShortURLs

useMultipleScopeNodesEndpoint.description: Makes the frontend use the 'names' param for fetching multiple scope nodes at once

useScopeSingleNodeEndpoint.description: Use the single node endpoint for the scope api. This is used to fetch the scope parent node.

useScopesNavigationEndpoint.description: Use the scopes navigation endpoint instead of the dashboardbindings endpoint

useSessionStorageForRedirection.description: Use session storage for handling the redirection after login

vizActionsAuth.description: Allows authenticated API calls in actions

zanzanaNoLegacyClient.description: Use openFGA as main authorization engine and disable legacy RBAC clietn.

featureToggles.description:
Describes available feature toggles in Grafana. These can be configured via
conf/custom.ini to enable features under development or not yet available in
stable version.

Only enabled values will be returned in this interface.

NOTE: the possible values may change between versions without notice, although
this may cause compilation issues when depending on removed feature keys, the
runtime state will continue to work.
